channel.title: Prights help and Pcrowns
channel.description:
this is what i want
Prights = 1 = Apprentice = Silver Crown
Prights = 2 = Mod = Silver Crown
Prights = 3 = Jr Admin = Silver Crown
Prights = 4 = Admin = Gold Crown
Prights = 5 = Owner = Gold Crown
Prights = 6 = Undercover Admin = No crown
how do i add the prights and crowns?
